title: How do I transfer assets to my offline machine?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I would like to transfer Assets to my offline machine
  • I would like to download Assets to my offline machine

sections.title: Cause
content: Your project may currently be stored on an offline machine or environment and you need to add Assets that have been purchased on the Asset Store to the project.

sections.title: Resolution
content: 1. You will need to first download the asset via a machine that is connected to the Internet.
2. Once downloaded, you can find the asset files in the following directory.
3. You can transfer the asset files via USB to the offline machine, or one of the machines in your offline environment.

sections.title: More Information
content: Please note: If you need all users in your offline environment to use the Asset you will need to share it via the network using source control, also, if the Asset(s) in question are 'editor extensions' or in the Asset description it says 'license per seat' then '1' copy of the Asset per developer will need to be purchased.
